data.name: Classic Snake Adventures
data.detailed_description:
A 4K@120FPS/60FPS reboot of the classic retro game snake introduced in 1997. Remade with gorgeous hand-drawn 2d art and a 3d snake. The snake's mechanics are completely new. This 3d snake can bend, and change size and speed during game-play, something you won’t see in any other snake games. A state of the art game with the retro beloved gameplay of snake 97.


Nibble your way through 100 amazing rounds in 5 worlds with 20 different bosses! The quest is easy: avoid all obstacles and eat the remaining fruit. The reptile will increase in size and speed after eating, especially if you eat the meat. Soda can make you smaller again. If you touch a turbo booster, your speed will increase rapidly for a few seconds, so try not to crash!
Bonus letters appear during your nimble quest. You better get them because if you complete the word ‘bonus,’ then you will get your hearts refilled and fat bonus points.


Features
  • 4K 2D Cartoon - 4K@60FPS or 4K@120FPS (Requires >= 120Hz Monitor & 2.1 HDMI & Capable GPU)
  • Beautiful hand-drawn 2D art rendered in 4K
  • 3d snake that bends and grows.
  • Map with 5 beautiful worlds
  • Lots of gameplay, 100 rounds, 20 bosses.
  • World leaderboard.
  • 14 achievments
  • A state of the art game with the beloved retro gameplay of snake 97.

GAMEPADS SUPPORT
Read the announcement to see how to set up the game-pads:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1188580?emclan=103582791465753522&emgid=3094537058226717268

data.short_description: A 4K@120FPS/60FPS reboot of the classic retro game snake introduced in 1997. Remade with gorgeous hand-drawn 2d art and a 3d snake.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12
  • Processor: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.14
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
